meanings.definition: A fish with fins for swimming.
meanings.sent1: The colorful finfish swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of finfish while snorkeling in the reef.
meanings.sent3: Why did the finfish bring a suitcase to the ocean? To have a 'fin'tastic vacation!
meanings.sent4: The finfish glided through the water like a feather in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the finfish caught the sunlight, creating a mesmerizing display.

meanings.sent1: The fishermen caught various types of finfish in the lake.
meanings.sent2: It is important to protect the habitats of all finfish species.
meanings.sent3: Why did the finfish refuse to share its snacks? Because it was a little shellfish!
meanings.sent4: The market was bustling with vendors selling fresh finfish from the sea.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared a delicious dish using locally caught finfish as the main ingredient.
